resources.string: You don\'t have any alarms set!\nUse the button to add alarms
That does not look quite right
Tell us when you want to wake up and leave the rest to us
Decide between waking up or snoozing your alarm
Turn off your alarm by playing a mimic game
Play mimic games to wake up and stay up

Mimicker is a morning alarm which helps you get up and stay up by playing a mimic, or game, to copy a given task. Watch out – if you run out of time, your phone will start ringing. Once you match the mimic, share how you woke up and beat the clock.

You can’t fool us. We are able to judge your mimic by using Microsoft Project Oxford, a platform of machine learning REST APIs that can understand faces, images, videos, and language. The APIs are easy to get started and you can use them for free. 

We built Mimicker to show how developers can use Microsoft Project Oxford. All of our code is available on GitHub where you can view the source, file issues, or contribute your own mimic.

Contact us with questions, bugs, or suggestions. We’d love to hear from you!
I woke up this morning with Mimicker http://mimicker.ai
